tasks.label: Pico Build
tasks.command: docker build --pull --rm -f "${workspaceFolder}/PicoDev.Dockerfile" -t picodev:latest "." && docker build --rm -f "${workspaceFolder}/PicoProject.Dockerfile" -t picoproject:latest "." && docker run --rm --name pico -dit picoproject:latest && docker cp pico:/root/pico/artifacts/ "${workspaceFolder}/" && docker container kill pico
